sentences.en: Her angry outburst was totally unprovoked.
sentences.cn: 她的暴跳如雷完全是无理取闹。

sentences.en: It was a totally unprovoked attack on an innocent man.
sentences.cn: 那完全是对一名无辜男子的无端袭击。

sentences.en: John Constantine is forced to find answers when Half - Breed Demons begin attacking him unprovoked.
sentences.cn: 当恶灵开始攻击他的时候,约翰.君士坦丁和他的同伴一起,去查明事情的真相、揭开地狱之谜.

sentences.en: She, in this unprovoked at the autumn sky.
sentences.cn: 它, 在这个秋天兂端旳望着天空.

sentences.en: Stephen was stabbed to death in an unprovoked attack nearly five months ago.
sentences.cn: 斯蒂芬在近5个月前无故遭到袭击，被捅死了。

sentences.en: The boys'attack on the old woman was quite unprovoked.
sentences.cn: 那帮男孩对老妇人的袭击完全是无来由的.

sentences.en: The International Shark Attack File describes shark attacks as either provoked or unprovoked.
sentences.cn: “国际鲨鱼攻击档案”描述鲨鱼攻击要么“被激起”要么“不被激起”.

sentences.en: They also observed unprovoked shelling of South Ossetia's capital, Tskhinvali, that night.
sentences.cn: 那天晚上他们还观察到南奥塞梯首府茨欣瓦利无端遭到炮轰.

sentences.en: They said the attack had been unprovoked.
sentences.cn: 他们说那次攻击是无缘无故的.

sentences.en: This malicious and unprovoked attack astounded him.
sentences.cn: 这个恶意的无端攻击使他吃惊.

sentences.en: Work has been leaked unprovoked, many people also suffer a loss.
sentences.cn: 作品无端被泄露, 受损失的还大有人在.

trans.tran_cn: （尤指暴力言行）未受招惹而自发的，无缘无故的
trans.tran_en: unprovoked anger, attacks etc are directed at someone who has not done anything to deserve them
